## What is GitHub Pages?

GitHub Pages is a free hosting service that allows you to publish static websites directly from a GitHub repository.

### Features

- Free hosting  
- HTTPS enabled  
- GitHub integration  
- Custom domains

### Why Use GitHub Pages?

- No server configuration  
- Perfect for static websites  
- Ideal for student projects

---

## What is Reveal.js?

Reveal.js is a JavaScript framework for creating presentations using HTML and Markdown.

### Advantages

- Browser-based  
- Keyboard navigation  
- Supports Markdown  
- Highly customizable

## Jekyll Overview

Jekyll is a static site generator used by GitHub Pages.

### Benefits

- No database required  
- Markdown support  
- Layouts & themes  
- Fast loading
